boofcv.processing

Class SimpleGray

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.processing.SimpleImage<ImageSingleBand>
      • boofcv.processing.SimpleGray

  • public class SimpleGray
extends SimpleImage<ImageSingleBand>
    High level interface for handling gray scale images

      • removePerspective

        public SimpleGray removePerspective(int outWidth,
                                    int outHeight,
                                    double x0,
                                    double y0,
                                    double x1,
                                    double y1,
                                    double x2,
                                    double y2,
                                    double x3,
                                    double y3)
        Removes perspective distortion. 4 points must be in 'this' image must be in clockwise order.
        Parameters:
        outWidth - Width of output image
        outHeight - Height of output image
        Returns:
        Image with perspective distortion removed
